channel.title: How to make my server have 99 stats instead of 135?
channel.description: i've tryed tuts to make stats 99 but they don't work for me, i can't use pimpscape sourced tuts. i use cheezscape server. please post how to change it or a cheezscape server source based tut! thanks!

item.title: How to make my server have 99 stats instead of 135?
item.dc:creator: @grova grova
item.description:
@grova wrote:

[size=1pt][code=applescript]Purpose: change max stats

Difficulty: 1/10

Assumed Knowledge: c&p and searching

Server Base: Tested on test(might work on any)

Procedure : go into client.java and search for

Code:
for public int getXPForLevel(int level) {
You should see something like

Code:
public int getXPForLevel(int level) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

  for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= level; lvl++) {
     points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
     if (lvl >= level) {
        return output;
     }
     output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
  }
  return 0;

}

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

  for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) {
     points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
     output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
     if (output >= exp) {
        return lvl;
     }
  }
  return 135;

}[/code][/size]
Change all the 135’s to 99 or w.e[sub][/sub]

Read full topic
